PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-04911998-03-250,  ,  ,  ,  ,  CITIZENSHIP
PrecisAppointment of the following persons as full-time members of the Convention Refugee Determination Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montreal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour, for a term of three years, effective April 20, 1998. (GIOVANNA ALLÈGRA, of Gatineau, Quebec; BANA BARAZI, of Outremont, Quebec; JEANINE BEAUBIEN-DUQUE, of Île-des-Soeurs, Quebec; MICHEL GOULET, of Pierrefonds, Quebec; SYLVIE LÉVESQUE, of Outremont, Quebec; TONY MANGLAVITI, of Dollard-des-Ormeaux, Quebec; FARID OSMANE, of Laval-ouest, Quebec; HÉLÈNE PANAGAKOS, of Pierrefonds, Quebec; and SAJJAD RANDHAWA, of Repentigny, Quebec)
Attachments
